definition: according to/to act in accordance with/to depend on/to seize/to occupy
"hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
to reside/to be (in a certain position)/to store up/to be at a standstill/residence/house/restaurant/classifier for bedrooms
(archaic) sentence-final particle expressing a doubting attitude
it is said/allegedly/according to reports/or so they say
according to this/on the ground of the above/(formally introduces reported speech in writing)

sentences.english: According to informed sources, "the Deputy Editor-in-Chief" is an administrative level.
sentences.chinese: 据知情人士说，“副总编辑”是一个行政级别。

sentences.english: Under government policy, British nuclear submarines carry a maximum of 48 warheads.
sentences.chinese: 据政府政策规定，英国核潜艇最多可装载48颗弹头。

sentences.english: 73 countries reported collecting fewer than 10 donations per 1000 population.
sentences.chinese: 据73个国家报告，每千人献血不到10次。

sentences.english: Upon entering the construction, visitors have reported feeling dizzy and disorientated.
sentences.chinese: 据进入房间的参观者说，在里面感觉眩晕和神志不清。

sentences.english: Small and portable, the iron cauldron was once used as a field cauldron, according to experts.
sentences.chinese: 据专家介绍铁釜是一种行军锅，它体积小，便于携带。

sentences.english: He reportedly had three sons and two daughters.
sentences.chinese: 据报导，溥任膝下有三子二女。

sentences.english: Flooding forced the closure of manufacturing plants in Ayutthaya, according to news reports.
sentences.chinese: 据新闻报道，洪水已迫使大城府的制造工厂关闭。

sentences.english: The birth of rearward-firing missiles has changed the concept of aerial warfare, according to Wu.
sentences.chinese: 据吴声称，后射导弹的出现改变了空战的概念。

sentences.english: According to some, seeking prominence is part of an inborn survival strategy.
sentences.chinese: 据一些科学家说，寻找显著性是与生俱来的生存技巧。

sentences.english: Judy Garland, he recalls, was also fond of a tipple(9).
sentences.chinese: 据他回忆，茱蒂嘉兰也很喜欢烈性葡萄酒。

sentences.english: By my reckoning we were seven or eight kilometres from Borj Mechaab.
sentences.chinese: 据我估计我们离梅卡巴堡有七八公里远。

sentences.english: As you know, there are more than 2,000 journalists from China and abroad covering the NPC and CPPCC sessions.
sentences.chinese: 据我知道，参加两会采访的中外记者有2000多名。

sentences.english: Li Chang, 53, was suspended pending an investigation.
sentences.chinese: 据了解，现年53岁的李昶停职后将面临调查。

sentences.english: It is reported that the temperature will decline sharply in one or two days.
sentences.chinese: 据报告近日气温将明显下降。

sentences.english: There are reported descendents of Aisin Gioro present in China today.
sentences.chinese: 据报道目前爱新觉罗家在中国还有后裔。

sentences.english: According to data of eye-witnesses around Nablus tanks were stationed also approximately.
sentences.chinese: 据资料目击者纳布卢斯附近的坦克也派驻了大约。

definition: to quote/to cite/to recommend (one's friend's, associates etc)
according to a report/It is reported that...
